name: Raspberry Jam - 2022 (TALP)
description:
An small adventure game about making raspberry jam. The game uses no parser (using only touch to solve puzzles), two word parser and complex parser. Detailed information is in the games tutorial.

For those with older computers (win xp) use the x86 version otherwise try the x64 version.

Unzip the files into a created directory and run the raspberryjam.exe.

Project made with StoryPlayer5 game creator using LÖVE.
